title: Sound fps drop issue
body: So from what I been reading this  fps frame drop due to having sound enabled had been around for 4 plus months... and Rito has no other fix other than disable sound? Wtf Rito how about you find a fix. Going from 100 + fps to 8 fps cause sound is on is absurd.. So my question is are you guys at Rito actually trying to find a fix or you just hoping if you ignore issue long enough it will go away? Cause from all my past experience with Rito support that seems to be your standard go to.

replies.body: I fixed that very easily, just instal "realtek high definition audio" and it's done.

There was an issue a number of patches ago that affected FPS with specific configurations on Macs. This issue has since been resolved and any other FPS issues that are tied to sounds are not related but are separate issues. There are a lot of factors that could cause poor FPS, however, our [FPS guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) goes over the most common solutions to this issue. 

If you still have issues after taking the steps from the guide, please let me know.

i call BS on that.. I went through your fps guide and the only thing that made it better was disabling the sound. I know Rito's go to is it's your provider or computer when they don't know the answer to a question. Well it's not my computer, I've run multiple trace routes which were fine and everything else Rito support tells ya to do.. The problem is most assuredly on Rito's end, and has to do with game sounds.

Thanks for the steps taken so far to troubleshoot this!  Please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our tech team and we can take a closer look at what's going on with your specific issue.  To get more context, attach any of the logs you've obtained so far or the below set to get more info:

[DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)
[Your latest R3d Log (check the date!)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7)
[Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

We'll respond to your ticket as soon as possible!

DISABLE ALL IN-GAME SOUNDS
You may experience a performance boost by disabling your in-game sounds. You can do this in-game by pressing ESC, selecting SOUND and then checking the "Disable all Sound" box.

That is from the "FPS  Guide" So if the sound issue has been fixed like you suggest then why is that even there?

Oh and for the record I'm on PC, Mac's are garbage :D
